sentence.Network_en: I could elicit no response from him.
sentence.Network_cn: 我从他那里套不出任何反应。

sentence.Network_en: Mr Norris said he was hopeful that his request would elicit a positive response.
sentence.Network_cn: 诺里斯先生说希望他的请求能够引起积极反响。

sentence.Network_en: When I was able to elicit only a gentle smile, I thought perhaps this was a commentary on my humor.
sentence.Network_cn: 当我只能让人微微一笑时，我觉得这可能是对我幽默感的一种评价吧。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin elicit- 'drawn out by trickery or magic', from the verb elicere, from e- (variant of ex-) 'out' + lacere 'entice, deceive'

entry.def: If you elicit a response or a reaction, you do or say something which makes other people respond or react.

example.ex: Mr Norris said he was hopeful that his request would elicit a positive response...
example.tran: 诺里斯先生说希望他的请求能够引起积极反响。

example.ex: The crime elicited an outcry against illicit drugs.
example.tran: 那起罪行引发了打击违禁药品的呼声。

entry.def: If you elicit a piece of information, you get it by asking the right questions.

example.ex: Phone calls elicited no further information.
example.tran: 几个电话都没有打听到进一步的消息。

sentences.sentence: "We drew out some interesting linguistic data from the native informant"

auth_sentence.content: Jesse likes stirring the pot to elicit opinions.

auth_sentence.content: I have been trying to elicit a response to my question.

auth_sentence.content: I'm trying to elicit from you what the more is.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 纤弱的;精致的;微妙的;灵敏的
stems_affixes.word_buile: de加强+lic高兴,美味,引诱+ate……的→令人高兴的,优美的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 美味的;美妙的;使人愉快的
stems_affixes.word_buile: de加强+lic美味+ious……的→adj.美味的;美妙的;使人愉快的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 精致,细微,微妙,精良;美味,佳肴
stems_affixes.word_buile: de加强+lic高兴,美味,引诱+acy表名词→n.精致,细微,微妙,精良;美味,佳肴

sentences.en: In one hour he had elicited the truth.
sentences.cn: 不到一个小时, 他就查明了真相。

jushi.english: Their appeals for funds didn't elicit much of a response.
jushi.chinese: 他们征集资金的呼吁并没有引起多大的反应。

jushi.english: I didn't elicit information by inquiring.
He elicited the truth at last, by question-ing all the boys in the school.
jushi.chinese: 他询问学校里的每一位男生,终于查出了真相。
